context.title: Neo4j Graph view
context.description: The Neo4j Graph view visualizes the nodes available in a Neo4j node space.

context.title: Relationship Type view
context.description: The Neo4j Relationship Types view presents a list of existing relationship types and let you create new such types and perform different operations on the node space.

context.title: Properties view
context.description: The Neo4j properties view is used to read and alter properties of nodes and relationships.
